Translations.Text: yaayyuha alladhina amanu hal adullukum ʿala tijaratin tunjikum min ʿadhabin alimin
tu'minuna bil-lahi warasulihi watujahiduna fi sabili l-lahi bi-amwalikum wa-anfusikum dhalikum khayrun lakum in kuntum taʿlamuna
yaghfir lakum dhunubakum wayud'khil'kum jannatin tajri min tahtiha l-anharu wamasakina tayyibatan fi jannati ʿadnin dhalika l-fawzu l-ʿazimu
wa-ukh'ra tuhibbunaha nasrun mina l-lahi wafathun qaribun wabashiri l-mu'minina

yaayyuha alladhina amanu kunu ansara l-lahi kama qala ʿisa ub'nu maryama lil'hawariyyina man ansari ila l-lahi qala l-hawariyuna nahnu ansaru l-lahi faamanat taifatun min bani is'raila wakafarat taifatun fa-ayyadna alladhina amanu ʿala ʿaduwwihim fa-asbahu zahirina
